tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT,
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE GameReviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    reviewer_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_rating INT,
  review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_reviews (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerFeedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_player_id (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerReviews (
    review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP,
    rating INT,
    INDEX idx_player_id (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GameRatings (
    rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id UUID,
    player_id UUID,
    rating INT,
    rating_date TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_game_id (game_id),
    INDEX idx_player_id (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CommunityEngagement (
    engagement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID,
    engagement_type TEXT,
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
    INDEX idx_player_id (player_id)
);
